WRITING.TEXT: I choose the book 1 hair style because I found it to be more iconic. I also wanted his face to be much lighter, and it would of been much darker with his black hair covering a good majority of his head.
I couldn't really find a place for Momo in the composition except for a little silhouette next to Appa, and then I decided against it :x.

WRITING.TITLE: [Fan content] Heroes of the Nation - Happy 10th Anniversary Avatar!

WRITING.TEXT: Haha, you are right, but I liked the picture facing left.
D: I will have to live with that mistake forever

WRITING.TITLE: Traversing the Abyss (Artorias and Sif fan art)
